headline: Is It Too Late To Consider Tapestry (TPR) After Its Strong Multi‑Year Share Price Run?
summary: If you are wondering whether Tapestry's share price still offers value or if most of the upside has already been priced in, you are in the right place. Tapestry's stock has had a mixed short term run, with a 1% decline over the last 7 days, but returns of 23.4% over 30 days, 20.5% year to date and 84.9% over the past year, and a very large gain over 5 years that is more than triple the starting level. Those moves have kept Tapestry on many investors' radars, especially as the company...
